章节结构

  • 常用符号：

    = - ` : . ' " ~ ^ _ * + #

  • 所有可用符号：

    ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ ` { | } ~

Transition

Transition 符号由4个或以上 章节结构 里允许用的符号组成，都会被渲染成水平线。如下面的水平线是由 #### 渲染成的。

- 直接使用网址，以http或https起头：

  http://yongchen.org

- 用文字表示链接 I：

  `my site <http://yongchen.org>`_

- 用文字表示链接 II：

  `my site`_

  .. _my site: http://yongchen.org

- 所有的章节标题都可以被引用：

  `章节结构`_

  • 直接使用网址，以http或https起头：

    http://yongchen.org

  • 用文字表示链接 I：

    my site

  • 用文字表示链接 II：

    my site

  • 所有的章节标题都可以被引用：

    章节结构

footnote reference [1]

[1]A footnote example linked to [1].

- \*星号*

- \``代码符号``

- 反斜杠 \\

使用 backslash 显示那些特殊字符。

  • *星号*
  • ``代码符号``
  • 反斜杠 \
 
Lists:

- item 1. 第一项前和最后一项后必须各留出一空行.
- item 2. List 由 "*", "+", "-" 等符号引导。

- item 3. 中间各项之间可留空行也可省略.

  1. nested item 1. 此前又须留出一空行。数字型的list接
     受这几种格式：

     a. 阿拉伯数字 1, 2, 3 ...
     #. 大写或小写字母 A, B, ..., Z. a, b, ..., z.
     #. 大写或小写罗马数字 I, II, ... 或 i, ii, ...

Definition Lists: 词或变量

what
    Definition lists associate a term with a
    definition.

lines : string
    List of one-line strings without newlines.

Field Lists:

:Authors:
    Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs,
    David Goodger

    (and sundry other good-natured folks)

:Version: 1.0 of 2001/08/08

:Dedication: To my father.

Option Lists:

-a file    command-line option "a"
--input=file    long options can also have arguments
/V    DOS/VMS-style options too

Lists:

  • item 1. 第一项前和最后一项后必须各留出一空行.
  • item 2. List 由 "*", "+", "-" 等符号引导。
  • item 3. 中间各项之间可留空行也可省略.
    1. nested item 1. 此前又须留出一空行。数字型接 受这几种格式：
      1. 阿拉伯数字 1, 2, 3 ...
      2. 大写或小写字母 A, B, ..., Z. a, b, ..., z.
      3. 大写或小写罗马数字 I, II, ... 或 i, ii, ...

Literal Blocks:

::

  Whitespace, newlines, blank lines, and all kinds of
  markup is preserved by literal blocks.

Per-line quoting can also be used on unindented
literal blocks (顶格写时每行的 ``>`` 符号不可少)::

> Useful for quotes from email and
> for Haskell literate programming.

Line Blocks: （注意渲染后的样式与普通文字一样）

| Line blocks are useful for addresses,
| verse, and adornment-free lists.

| Each new line begins with a
| vertical bar ("|").
|     Line breaks and initial indents
|     are preserved.
| Continuation lines are wrapped
  portions of long lines; they begin
  with spaces in place of vertical bars.

Doctest Blocks: 以 ``<<<`` 打头

>>> print "This is a doctest block."
This is a doctest block.

Literal Blocks:

Whitespace, newlines, blank lines, and all kinds of
markup is preserved by literal blocks.

Per-line quoting can also be used on unindented literal blocks (顶格写时每行的 > 符号不可少):

> Useful for quotes from email and
> for Haskell literate programming.

Line Blocks: （注意渲染后的样式与普通文字一样）

Line blocks are useful for addresses,
verse, and adornment-free lists.
Each new line begins with a
vertical bar ("|").
Line breaks and initial indents
are preserved.
Continuation lines are wrapped portions of long lines; they begin with spaces in place of vertical bars.

Doctest Blocks: 以 <<< 打头

>>> print "This is a doctest block."
This is a doctest block.

+------------+------------+-----------+
| Header 1   | Header 2   | Header 3  |
+============+============+===========+
| body row 1 | column 2   | column 3  |
+------------+------------+-----------+
| body row 2 | Cells may span columns.|
+------------+------------+-----------+
| body row 3 | Cells may  | - Cells   |
+------------+ span rows. | - contain |
| body row 4 |            | - blocks. |
+------------+------------+-----------+

=====  =====  ======
   Inputs     Output
------------  ------
  A      B    A or B
=====  =====  ======
False  False  False
True   False  True
False  True   True
True   True   True
=====  =====  ======

表格：

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
body row 1 column 2 column 3
body row 2 Cells may span columns.
body row 3 Cells may span rows.
  • Cells
  • contain
  • blocks.
body row 4
Inputs Output
A B A or B
False False False
True False True
False True True
True True True

Nikola 常用语法

**Math**: 在 ``tags`` 中添加 ``mathjax`` 启用 LaTeX.

- inline math:

  Euler’s formula: :math:`e^{ix} = \cos x + i\sin x`

- displayed math:

  .. math::

     \int \frac{dx}{1+ax}=\frac{1}{a}\ln(1+ax)+C

Math: 在 tags 中添加 mathjax 启用 LaTeX.

  • inline math:

    Euler’s formula: \(e^{ix} = \cos x + i\sin x\)

  • displayed math:

    \begin{equation*} \int \frac{dx}{1+ax}=\frac{1}{a}\ln(1+ax)+C \end{equation*}
